name: Une tête disparaît
summary: Jacqueline has lost her mind a bit, but whatever, for her trip to the seaside, she has decided to take the train by herself, like a big girl!
info:
• 中文名: 头消失了

  • 别名: The Head Vanishes
  • 别名: 消失的脑袋
  • 别名: 头没了
